name: NeoCandy
description:
NeoCandy - this is rogue like action shooter in Pixel style.Make your way through the mazes. Destroy enemies. Choose ammunition and survive. First aid kits will allow you to have more.

Generated world in pixel style. Many weapons, enemies and labyrinths.

Pixel graphic style, hardcore and unforgettable music is all you need for a pleasant

WASD - move. Mouse -AIM
Kill all enemy
